title: Let’s Cook Together 2
description: Cooperate & communicate to cook delicious dishes in this #TrulyTogetherGaming experience . Visit different countries to learn the secrets of local cuisines, upgrade your kitchen appliances and immerse yourself in a deep story about food, love and the hidden costs of freedom. Engage in split-second PvP battles or make your own kitchens in the Level Editor and share them with the community. Everyone will find a taste of their own in Let’s Cook Together 2. Keep Driving

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
